sakai:pagecontent:
Media enquiries

Be sure to check our media area.

Media enquiries are always welcome. Cambridge University has a dedicated Press Office, who are happy to answer any queries or requests for help. All neuroscience-related enquiries should be directed to Genevieve Maul at the Press Office.

All other enquiries

To contact a member of Cambridge Neuroscience

Many of our members provide details of their email address on their profile or webpage. If this is not provided, then please call the University Switchboard on +44 (0)1223 337733 and they will be able to put you through.

Search the directory

Cambridge Neuroscience Coordinator

For information about Cambridge Neuroscience please contact the Coordinator:

Dr. Hannah Critchlow
coordinator@neuroscience.cam.ac.uk

University of Cambridge

Cambridge, CB2 3EB, UK
